接口的使用
org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client.ExchangeFunction

  • 使用ExchangeFunction的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client
    Provides a reactive WebClient that builds on top of the org.springframework.http.client.reactive reactive HTTP adapter layer.

    • org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client中ExchangeFunction的使用

      返回ExchangeFunction的org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default ExchangeFunction ExchangeFilterFunction.apply(ExchangeFunction exchange)
      Apply this filter to the given ExchangeFunction, resulting in a filtered exchange function.
      static ExchangeFunction ExchangeFunctions.create(ClientHttpConnector connector)
      Create an ExchangeFunction with the given ClientHttpConnector.
      static ExchangeFunction ExchangeFunctions.create(ClientHttpConnector connector, ExchangeStrategies strategies)
      Create an ExchangeFunction with the given ClientHttpConnector and ExchangeStrategies.
      default ExchangeFunction ExchangeFunction.filter(ExchangeFilterFunction filter)
      Filters this exchange function with the given ExchangeFilterFunction, resulting in a filtered ExchangeFunction.
      参数类型为ExchangeFunction的org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default ExchangeFunction ExchangeFilterFunction.apply(ExchangeFunction exchange)
      Apply this filter to the given ExchangeFunction, resulting in a filtered exchange function.
      WebClient.Builder WebClient.Builder.exchangeFunction(ExchangeFunction exchangeFunction)
      Provide an ExchangeFunction pre-configured with ClientHttpConnector and ExchangeStrategies.
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<ClientResponse> ExchangeFilterFunction.filter(ClientRequest request, ExchangeFunction next)
      Apply this filter to the given request and exchange function.
